ygData.subject: RE: Lined Vials
ygData.msgSnippet: Go back and check the spell again, I believe you will find that we need Poison Vials Tinkerten Iktomi Gnome Enchanter 29th season Blood Tide Traffic Controll
ygData.messageBody:
Go back and check the spell again, I believe you will find that we need
Poison Vials

Tinkerten Iktomi
Gnome Enchanter 29th season
Blood Tide Traffic Controll
Solusek Ro

-----Original Message-----
From: Conrad Lesnewski [mailto:clesnew@...]
Sent: Tuesday, November 23, 1999 7:41 PM
To: EQ_Potters@onelist.com
Subject: RE: [EQ_Potters] Lined Vials


From: Conrad Lesnewski <clesnew@...>


No, we don't. Only regular vials are needed to produce Thickened or Cloudy
Mana.

Calbasil Psyrex of Ak'Anon (Bertoxx)
Enchanter of the 32nd Level
House of Silmindo

Master Baker
Master Brewer
Master Beggar
Master Fisher
Master Jeweler
Master Smith
Senior Journeyman Tailor
Journeyman Tinker

High Master of doing anything to waste my hard earned cash and avoid
spending time leveling :)



At 04:02 PM 11/23/99 -0700, you wrote:
>
>I thought enchanters only needed regular vials. They use lined too??
>
>Tanana (Bristlebane)
>Master Brewer
>Master Potter
>Master Beggar
>
